name: RPG (IM-08)
description:
Clone of Card-Jitsu (from Club Penguin), which is essentially just Rock-Paper-Scissors with extra rules. In this case:

  • Rock = Circle
  • Paper = Square
  • Scissors = Triangle

To win:

  • 1 card of each shape
  • 3 cards of 1 shape (with different colors)
  • Have your opponent run out of playable cards
